snippet: Anyone seeking to take one last look at the "Sphere" sculpture, which survived the 9/11 terror, should hurry down to Battery Park -- or maybe not.
abstract: Anyone seeking to take one last look at the "Sphere" sculpture, which survived the 9/11 terror, should hurry down to Battery Park -- or maybe not.

headline.main: Spherical Symbol of Resilience Is Going Away, but It's Unclear Where
headline.print_headline: A Round Symbol Of Resilience Rolls Out of Public View
